attributes.action: Stop SKY killing freeview with their planned pay tv on DTT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sky are taking over all the UK TV, get OFCOM to stop SKY from scrapping their free to air channels and stop them from creating a pay tv on DTT.

If people want pay tv then they can sign up to sky, virgin media etc - but freeview should remain free.

OFCOM should only allow the use of the the DTT system for free to air, due to the analogue switch off.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
